{"id":262434037,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 years, 7 months","timestamp":1568938859,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/262434037/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"N/A","code":"#include <unordered_map>\n\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        unordered_map<char, int> umap;\n        \n        int counter = 1;\n        int maxLen = 0;\n        int currLen = 0;\n        \n        \n        for (int i = 0; i < s.size(); i++) {\n            if (umap[s[i]] != counter) {\n                umap[s[i]] = counter;\n                currLen++;\n            } else {\n                counter++;\n                if (maxLen < currLen) {\n                    maxLen = currLen;\n                }\n                currLen = 1;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        if (maxLen < currLen) {\n            maxLen = currLen;\n        }\n        \n        return maxLen;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
